key_drivers: Real yields falling sharply (10Y TIPS at 1.80%, down 16-22bps in 2 weeks), bullish for gold, tech, and risk assets
USD weakening (DXY ~97.79, -9.26% YoY, in 2026 downtrend), supporting commodities and FX
BOJ hawkish pivot (rate hike to 1% expected by June) and RBA just hiked to 3.85%, driving JPY and AUD strength
Credit spreads at historic lows (HY OAS 2.88%), MOVE index falling (64.3), and SOX rising - all risk-on signals
EIA crude draw of 9.0M barrels (below 5-year average) supporting oil prices

fallbacks_used: World Gold Council for ETF flows
